00162 static orxINLINE orxU32 orxMath_GetBitCount(orxU32 _u32Value)
00163 {
00164   _u32Value -= ((_u32Value >> 1) & 0x55555555);
00165   _u32Value = (((_u32Value >> 2) & 0x33333333) + (_u32Value & 0x33333333));
00166   _u32Value = (((_u32Value >> 4) + _u32Value) & 0x0f0f0f0f);
00167   _u32Value += (_u32Value >> 8);
00168   _u32Value += (_u32Value >> 16);
00169   return(_u32Value & 0x0000003f);
00170 }
00171 
00176 static orxINLINE orxU32 orxMath_GetTrailingZeroCount(orxU32 _u32Value)
00177 {
00178   /* De Bruijn multiply look up table */
00179   static const orxU32 sau32DeBruijnLUT[32] = 
00180   {
00181     0, 1, 28, 2, 29, 14, 24, 3, 30, 22, 20, 15, 25, 17, 4, 8, 
00182     31, 27, 13, 23, 21, 19, 16, 7, 26, 12, 18, 6, 11, 5, 10, 9
00183   };
00184 
00185   /* Done! */
00186   return sau32DeBruijnLUT[((orxU32)(((orxS32)_u32Value & -(orxS32)_u32Value) * 0x077CB531U)) >> 27];
00187 }

00193 static orxINLINE orxBOOL orxMath_IsPowerOfTwo(orxU32 _u32Value)
00194 {
00195   orxBOOL bResult;
00196 
00197   /* Updates result */
00198   bResult = ((_u32Value & (_u32Value - 1)) == 0) ? orxTRUE : orxFALSE;
00199   
00200   /* Done! */
00201   return bResult;
00202 }
00203 
00208 static orxINLINE orxU32 orxMath_GetNextPowerOfTwo(orxU32 _u32Value)
00209 {
00210   orxU32 u32Result;
00211 
00212   /* Non-zero? */
00213   if(_u32Value != 0)
00214   {
00215     /* Updates result */
00216     u32Result = _u32Value - 1;
00217     u32Result = u32Result | (u32Result >> 1);
00218     u32Result = u32Result | (u32Result >> 2);
00219     u32Result = u32Result | (u32Result >> 4);
00220     u32Result = u32Result | (u32Result >> 8);
00221     u32Result = u32Result | (u32Result >> 16);
00222     u32Result++;
00223   }
00224   else
00225   {
00226     /* Updates result */
00227     u32Result = 1;
00228   }
00229   
00230   /* Done! */
00231   return u32Result;
00232 }

00240 static orxINLINE orxFLOAT orxMath_SmoothStep(orxFLOAT _fMin, orxFLOAT _fMax, orxFLOAT _fValue)
00241 {
00242   orxFLOAT fTemp, fResult;
00243 
00244   /* Gets normalized and clamped value */
00245   fTemp = (_fValue - _fMin) / (_fMax - _fMin);
00246   fTemp = orxCLAMP(fTemp, orxFLOAT_0, orxFLOAT_1);
00247 
00248   /* Gets smoothed result */
00249   fResult = fTemp * fTemp * (orx2F(3.0f) - (orx2F(2.0f) * fTemp));
00250 
00251   /* Done! */
00252   return fResult;
00253 }
00254 
00261 static orxINLINE orxFLOAT orxMath_SmootherStep(orxFLOAT _fMin, orxFLOAT _fMax, orxFLOAT _fValue)
00262 {
00263   orxFLOAT fTemp, fResult;
00264 
00265   /* Gets normalized and clamped value */
00266   fTemp = (_fValue - _fMin) / (_fMax - _fMin);
00267   fTemp = orxCLAMP(fTemp, orxFLOAT_0, orxFLOAT_1);
00268 
00269   /* Gets smoothed result */
00270   fResult = fTemp * fTemp * fTemp * (fTemp * ((fTemp * orx2F(6.0f)) - orx2F(15.0f)) + orx2F(10.0f));
00271 
00272   /* Done! */
00273   return fResult;
00274 }

00297 {
00298   register orxFLOAT fResult;
00299 
00300 #ifdef __orxMSVC__
00301 
00302   /* Updates result */
00303   fResult = cosf(_fOp);
00304 
00305 #else /* __orxMSVC__ */
00306 
00307   /* Updates result */
00308   fResult = cosf(_fOp);
00309 
00310 #endif /* __orxMSVC__ */
00311 
00312   /* Done! */
00313   return fResult;
00314 }

00498 static orxINLINE orxFLOAT    orxMath_Round(orxFLOAT _fOp)
00499 {
00500   register orxFLOAT fResult;
00501 
00502 #ifdef __orxMSVC__
00503 
00504   /* Updates result */
00505   fResult = (fmodf(_fOp, orxFLOAT_1) >= orx2F(0.5f)) ? ceilf(_fOp) : floorf(_fOp);
00506 
00507 #else /* __orxMSVC__ */
00508 
00509   /* Updates result */
00510   fResult = rintf(_fOp);
00511 
00512 #endif /* __orxMSVC__ */
00513 
00514   /* Done! */
00515   return fResult;
00516 }
